name: redux-action-decorators
description: Decorators to build action creator factories

scripts.coverage: NODE_PATH='./src' babel-node $(npm bin)/isparta cover --include "**/!(*test).js" node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --recursive src
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Vladimir Danchenkov <vladimir.danchenkov@gmail.com>
